issues.description: In the problem statementâ€™s Part 2 description, it says each PersonController method takes a Consumer<List<Note>> parameter, but both the template and solution actually define Consumer<List<Person>>. This mismatch in the generic parameter type could confuse students and lead to compilation errors when they implement PersonController.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to refer to Consumer<List<Person>> (not Consumer<List<Note>>) for the PersonController methods.
